name: dnaspec-context-engineering
description: Professional context engineering skills for AI-assisted development, including context analysis, optimization, and cognitive template application
author: DNASPEC Team

commands.name: /dnaspec-analyze
commands.description: Analyze context quality across 5 dimensions: clarity, relevance, completeness, consistency, efficiency

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Optional text to analyze. If omitted, analyzes current conversation context

commands.name: /dnaspec-optimize
commands.description: Optimize context quality with specific goals like clarity, completeness, relevance

parameters.name: goals
parameters.description: Comma-separated optimization goals (clarity, relevance, completeness, conciseness, consistency)

commands.name: /dnaspec-template
commands.description: Apply cognitive templates like chain-of-thought, few-shot, verification to structure thinking

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Template type: chain_of_thought, few_shot, verification, role_playing, understanding

permissions.description: Allow reading current conversation context for analysis
Allow adding analysis results to conversation

metadata.installation_notes: Requires Claude Desktop 4.0+ and active Anthropic API access
